attributes.action: Being able to use supermarket vouchers for formula milk
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to change this because it is a women’s choice on whether they bottle feed or breast feed. They should not be financially punished for their decision to bottle feed.
attributes.background: Supermarkets do not let you use their vouchers to buy formula baby milk because they are not allowed to promote it as it can not be Seen to undermine breast feeding. This needs to change it’s a women’s choice.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584541
